item.title: When AI’s ‘inevitable slowdown’ comes it could tank S&P 500 valuation by up to 20%, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: The looming danger, Goldman says, is when Amazon, Alphabet, Amazon, Meta, Microsoft, and Oracle decide to reduce their capex.

item.title: Democratic contender Andy Beshear of Kentucky launches podcast on SiriusXM
item.description: Beshear said on NBC's “Meet the Press” this summer that he will “take a look” at running for president in 2028.

item.title: Exclusive: Baseten, AI inference unicorn, raises $150 million at $2.15 billion valuation
item.description: Baseten has raised a $150 million Series D, led by Bond, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.title: ‘You’re all smirking out there’: Bipartisan congressional group joins forces to ban trading stocks by their colleagues
item.description: “It’s not every day you see this cast of characters up here,” said Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick, a moderate Republican who represents a swing district in Pe...

item.title: Railroad regulators to train 163 inspectors to spot cracks in railroad bridges, up from 7
item.description: The railroads themselves will still be responsible for inspecting their own bridges and the results will still be kept confidential.
